DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate daily disposable lens insert blister package versus daily disposable lens insert pre-soak Multi-purpose solution FID 107027 .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Daily Disposable Lenses With Multi-Purpose Solution ( MPS )

DOC.criteria: 18 year age old . Visual acuity correctable 20/30 ( Snellen ) good eye distance contact lenses . Successfully wear hydrogel silicone hydrogel contact lenses daily wear basis least two week prior study . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . History hypersensitivity component multipurpose solution . Evidence history ocular condition prescribe protocol . One functional eye monofit lens Any slitlamp find score equal 1 Visit 1 study period . Significant corneal stain visit 1 study period prescribe protocol . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
